endpoints.description: Retrieve the detailed performance metrics for a specified portfolio.
Upload and process a new portfolio dataset to calculate performance metrics.
Obtain an analysis of the diversification level of a given portfolio.
Submit data to perform a comprehensive risk assessment on a portfolio.
Retrieve comparative analysis data between a portfolio and selected benchmarks.
Get the list of set thresholds for portfolio performance alerts.
Configure notification thresholds for monitoring portfolio metrics.
Retrieve a summarized report of the investment portfolio's insights.
Access market trend analysis relevant to the portfolio.
Remove a previously uploaded portfolio dataset from the system.
